content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ricston may transfer your Personal Data, including any Special Categories of Personal Data as necessary, to third parties for the processing purposes set out in section 1.3 as follows:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the EPAM Group of Companies:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" As part of our global structure, employee managers or certain regional or global departments may be located at other EPAM group of companies. Therefore, our parent entity in the United States and other EPAM entities within the global EPAM group of companies may receive your Personal Data such as in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. In order to provide adequate protection for such Personal Data transfers, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and data transfers agreements including those based on the EU standard contractual clauses and similar forms deemed adequate by the European Commission and relevant authorities. A list of entities in the EPAM group of companies and their locations can be requested from \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"privacy@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors), banks, insurance carriers, benefits providers, and other third parties may also receive your Personal Data as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide compensation, administer and provide applicable benefits and other work-related allowances, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws and employment-related requirements, communicate with employees and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With our customers:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you work on customer projects, we may provide the customer with a description of your education and experience or a copy of your resume, with or without your name, but after removing your personal contact information. You might be asked to participate in interviews with our customer for the purpose of onboarding you on a customer project. Once you have been provisionally selected for a client project and before you can start on the project, there may be a requirement for you to undergo background checks (may include Personal Data concerning criminal record), which may be carried out by us, or a third party, for us to confirm to the customer that you have successfully passed any required background checks, always subject to applicable law. We may provide the customer with a statement confirming passing of background checks which may include no criminal conviction record. The customer will not receive information regarding your criminal convictions, if any.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During your cooperation with the customer, we may share data including The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your Personal Data, and to process your Personal Data only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to Personal Data transfers. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As the case may be, the above referred individuals/entities to whom your data may be made accessible will act as controllers, processors or persons authorized to process Personal Data, for the same purposes indicated in this Privacy Notice and in line with the laws of Malta.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As far as the transfer of your data towards any third countries (other than EU/EEA members) is concerned, Ricston guarantees that in any event the processing of such data will take place in accordance with one of the methodologies allowed by the law, such as for example: (i) your consent, (ii) the adoption of Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission, (iii) the selection of transferees which subscribed to programs pertaining to the free movement of data or which operate in countries considered as safe by the European Commission. If deemed necessary, Ricston will implement all other additional required organizational and technical safeguards.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
